name: Circus Circus Reno Hotel & Casino
description: Circus Circus Reno is Northern Nevada's only circus-themed casino resort. Free live circus acts, Carnival Midway arcade, and budget-friendly rooms. Part of THE ROW connected to Silver Legacy and Eldorado.
shortDescription: Budget-friendly casino with free circus acts, family entertainment, and THE ROW complex access.
highlights: Only circus-themed casino in Northern Nevada

roomTypes.name: Deluxe Room
roomTypes.description: Upgraded rooms with Sierra or city views.

parking: Free parking in Silver Legacy garage

faqs.question: Is Circus Circus good for golf groups on a budget?
faqs.answer: Yes — rooms from $89/night with full access to Silver Legacy and Eldorado via THE ROW.

faqs.question: Does Circus Circus have table games?
faqs.answer: Slots and video poker. Walk to Silver Legacy or Eldorado for live table games.

meta.title: Circus Circus Reno | Budget Hotel & Golf Packages
meta.description: Budget-friendly Circus Circus with free circus acts and THE ROW access. Golf packages from $89/night.
